flawed_nl_solution:
8 years ago James had 20-8=<<20-8=12>>12 years
So 8 years ago John had 12*2=24 years experience
That means John has 24+8=<<24+8=23>>23 years experience
So Mike has 23-16=<<23-16=7>>7 years of experience
So together they have 20+23+7=<<20+23+7=50>>50 years experience
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 32, not 23. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
